sheet.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under
sheet.translation[0].definitions[0].note: change the sheets (=put clean sheets on a bed)

sheet.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a piece of paper for writing on, or containing information
sheet.translation[0].definitions[1].note: clean/blank sheet of paper (=one with no writing on it)
sheet.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: a sheet of paper with names and numbers on it
sheet.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a thin flat piece of something such as metal or glass, that usually has four sides
sheet.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a large flat area of something such as ice or water spread over a surface
sheet.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: A sheet of ice covered the lake.
sheet.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a sheet of rain or fire is a very large moving mass of it
sheet.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: Sheets of flame shot into the air.
The rain was coming down in sheets.
sheet.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: a rope or chain attached to a sail on a ship that controls the angle between a sail and the wind
